item.title: Staff item

item.description:
@God11 wrote:

this is my code

if (ItemID == 773 && playerRights <= 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " IS TRYING TO WEAR P RING BAN HIM!!"); return 1000; }

now how would i get it to where it bans cause they tried wearing it if they non staff?
